etymology.description: Phonetic 來 (lái, 'to come') + semantic 夊 (sū, 'footprint pointing down; to walk slowly') — represents the grain's association with wheat and its growth.
etymology.interpretation: This character evokes the concept of wheat coming from the ground as it grows, represented by 夊. The phonetic part suggests a connection to its historical meaning.
etymology.simplification: 麦(麥) simplified by stroke reduction, eliminating the complex components of 夊.

parts.english: footprint pointing down; to walk slowly

examples.chinese: 我喜欢吃麦片(我喜歡吃麥片)。
小麦是主食之一(小麥是主食之一)。
examples.pinyin: Xiǎo mài shì zhǔshí zhī yī.
examples.english: Wheat is one of the staple foods.

examples.chinese: 这麦子收成很好(這麥子收成很好)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè mài zi shōuchéng hěn hǎo.
examples.english: This wheat harvest is very good.
